summary: Utility module that provides helper routines for loading and preprocessing RDF graph benchmark datasets (e.g., AIFB, AM, BGS, MUTAG) using DGL, and converting them into PyTorch tensors suitable for training relational graph convolutional networks.
business_intent: Enable rapid experimentation and model development for relational graph convolutional networks on standard benchmark datasets, supporting tasks such as entity classification and link prediction in research and production pipelines.
